text:
Encore || Full Stack Javascript Web Developer || Central London, Full-time, Onsite

https://joinencore.com

Encore, the UK's musicians network, is hiring a lead developer to join our 3-4 person team and work on all aspects of the site alongside our CTO.

Strong Javascript skills a must, experience with Node.js, Jade, MongoDB all useful.

Great salary + equity available. Get in touch to find out more: team@joinencore.com
